text: Jeopardy! is an edutainment game based on the game show of the same name. It was released in 1998 by Hasbro Interactive (publisher) and Artech Studios (developer) for the Microsoft Windows and PlayStation. For Macintosh MacSoft (publisher.) & PlayStation 2 version Atari SA. The game was only released in the United States and is based on the popular Sony Pictures Television show Jeopardy!. == Other websites == *Jeopardy! (PC) *Jeopardy! (PlayStation) *Jeopardy! (Macintosh) *Jeopardy! title: Jeopardy! (1998 video game)
